pages.title: Tell us about people you've been in close contact with

components.name: para1
components.content: To help us reduce the spread of bird (avian) flu, it's important for us to know who you live with and who you've been in close contact with.

components.name: para2
components.content: This is so we can provide the right advice and guidance to those that ngiteed it.

components.name: para3
components.content: You can use this service on behalf of someone else.

components.name: ifAKep
components.content: Before you start

components.name: tKEFcw
components.content: You'll be asked about:

components.name: QlWuFo
components.content: It should take about 10 minutes to complete.

components.name: TqEyQM
components.content: Any information you provide will be handled in strict confidence and will only be kept and used in line with data protection laws.

components.name: gfOVOL
components.content: If you need help completing this form

components.name: jmslVl
components.content: If you need help to complete this form, contact 111.

pages.title: Who are you completing this form for?
Your personal details

components.name: VnYxYj
components.content: Full name

components.name: VnYxYja
components.content: Date of birth

components.name: VnYxYi
components.content: Contact details

components.name: CIzhtp
components.content: Full name

components.name: VnYxYja
components.content: Date of birth

components.name: mWvTOY
components.content: How should we contact this person to provide them with advice and guidance?

components.name: iulooD
components.content: If the person is under 18 or unable to speak to us themselves, provide the contact details of a parent, carer or guardian.

components.name: ValidationScript
components.content: <script>document.querySelector("form[enctype='multipart/form-data']").addEventListener("submit",function(e){if(document.getElementById("mobile_number").value===""&&document.getElementById("landline_number").value===""&&document.getElementById("email_address").value===""){e.preventDefault();document.getElementById("at-least-one").className="govuk-error-message";document.getElementById("at-least-one").setAttribute("role","alert");}});</script>

components.title: Do you live with other people?

components.name: SUlWLU
components.title: Why are we asking for this information?
components.content: We ask this to identify people you live with who may be at risk. We may contact them to offer advice and guidance on how to protect themselves and others.

components.name: EiNVay
components.content: This does not include people {{ PersonalInformation.for }} live with. A close contact is someone {{ PersonalInformation.for }} have been near to and could have passed the virus on to. This includes anyone {{ PersonalInformation.for }} have:

components.name: been_in_contact

components.content: <script>document.querySelector("form[enctype='multipart/form-data']").addEventListener("submit",function(e){if(document.getElementById("mobile_number").value===""&&document.getElementById("landline_number").value===""&&document.getElementById("email_address").value===""){e.preventDefault();document.getElementById("at-least-one").className="govuk-error-message";document.getElementById("at-least-one").setAttribute("role","alert");}});</script>
